column4: Most people are customizing the Natty notification bar there unhappy with the messages so some have made it a drop down menu
uhm, but why indicators shift off the screen at 1024x768, and are not brought back if you close the window that caused the to shift off
Sounds like driver issue with Video Card some have posted x and y variables in games and others having trouble in netbooks with screensize....
There are already been bug reports about screensize....
for now i switched to 1280x1024 but it's too big to for me
Some users saying Blank spots in resolution on desktop others say off center... xorg needs worked out with video card driver...
